author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tamil University in Thanjavur is building an arts department in the design of the letter ‘j’ and another one for manuscripts in the form ‘eh’.

According to an official release, Chief Minister Jayalalithaa, under Section 110 of the Assembly, had announced the construction of the two buildings at a cost of Rs.15 crore.

Minister reviews works

School Education Minister K.C. Veeramani reviewed the progress of work on the two buildings and reviewed the design of another large complex being built with the library of the university at the centre.

The Public Works Department (PWD) officials briefed the Minister on the progress who asked them to complete the work by April.
title: Tamil varsity building in ‘j’ design
